item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, June 3, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Russia-China gas pipeline deal stalls over Beijing’s price demands
2. Number of UK grads opting for professional services is policy ‘failure’, says ex-Shell CEO
3. Nvidia unveils next generation of AI chips in bid to entrench market lead
4. Rupert Murdoch marries for a fifth time in California ceremony
5. Conviction politics: Joe Biden sees opportunity in Trump’s guilty verdict
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, June 3, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
